DidYouKnow.title: Did you know?
DidYouKnow.point1: Most learners spend hundreds of hours practicing to speak a new language, yet still struggle in front of foreigners. Confused by not understanding and not knowing how to react?
DidYouKnow.point2: With a team of native teachers, you will quickly improve your pronunciation, fluency, and confidence. The worry of “not being able to communicate with natives” will completely disappear.

Highlights.title: What is Aspirely?
Highlights.content:
Aspirely is an online language learning platform that focuses 100% on Listening and Speaking skills.

At Aspirely, you learn English and Chinese through real-life conversations. There are no dry textbooks, only effective, confident, and natural speaking practice.

Highlights.title: Courses
Highlights.content:
Daily conversations to speak more naturally and respond faster.

Listening & Speaking for IELTS & HSK to conquer international exams.

English and Chinese for work focusing on professional communication you can apply immediately.

Highlights.title: Teachers
Highlights.content:
By learning with native teachers, you will gradually speak more naturally, fluently, and confidently every day.

With Aspirely, you are not only learning a new language but also developing the skills to apply it in real life and at work.

items.name: Phuong Nghi
items.content: The website is easy to use, loads quickly, has a sleek interface, and online learning is very convenient without leaving home. The curriculum is personalized, so I study at the right level without pressure or rigidity. What I like most is the flexible schedule, perfect even for busy students like me.

items.name: Nhi Nguyen
items.content: The British lecturer's pronunciation is extremely accurate, she carefully corrects mistakes and always focuses on quality rather than quotas. Teacher Aimie is friendly, explains clearly, and is especially patient with slower learners like me. After some time studying, I've become much more confident speaking English.

items.name: My My
items.content: At first, I was quite worried about my English speaking ability, but thanks to the practical learning program and dedicated teachers, I've made clear progress. The topics are diverse and easy to apply in daily life. The teacher corrects pronunciation in detail word by word, creating a comfortable atmosphere for practice. Thanks to the center, I feel more confident communicating every day.
